name: Legba (Aquac)
description:
In the year 1962, Oliver's happyness is broken when a group of thugs invades his home, kill his father and kidnap his mother. Assisted only by the magical entity known as Papa Legba, will Oliver be able to save his mom and avenge his father?

This account is used as a portfolio of all my projects. You can find the team account here: https://deadlockvg.itch.io/legba
